title: Film continuity
creator_credit: Peter Thompson, Eric Halliday and AFTRS
brief_description: This film conveys the importance of technical, pictorial and narrative continuity and pre-planning for these. It also notes continuity of screen direction such as awareness of movement in the frame, eye lines and reverse shots. The function of the “continuity girl” or script supervisor is explained. Script by Caroline Stanton. This film is suitable for upper secondary students.
